mapper.select: SELECT R.RECORD_ID AS recordId, R.AMOUNT AS amount,R.PAYABLEEE AS payableee,R.PAYABLE_TIME AS payableTime, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=R.PAYABLEEE) AS payableeeUserName, (SELECT TEMP.TITLE FROM CONTRACT TEMP WHERE TEMP.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND TEMP.CONTRACT_ID=C.CONTRACT_ID) AS title FROM CONTRACT_PAYABLE_RECORD R LEFT JOIN CONTRACT_PAYABLE C ON R.ORG_ID=C.ORG_ID AND R.PAYABLE_ID=C.PAYABLE_ID WHERE R.ORG_ID=#{orgId} ORDER BY R.PAYABLE_TIME DESC LIMIT 0,10
